title: China’s top economic planning agency warns of rise of too many robots
description:
Beijing has flagged risks of excessive duplication in China’s rapidly growing humanoid robot sector, vowing to strengthen guidance for an industry that officials have identified as an important engine of future growth.

Driven by an influx of new capital, the number of humanoid robot companies in Ch...

title: What Trump Gets Wrong About China
description: Since its founding in 1922, Foreign Affairs has been the leading forum for serious discussion of American foreign policy and global affairs. The magazine has featured contributions from many leading international affairs experts.

title: Millions in China cram for civil service exam and the hope of a job for life
description:
A record number of people are set to take China’s notoriously gruelling national civil service exam this weekend, reflecting the increasing desire of Chinese workers to find employment in the public rather than private sector.

Around 3.7 million people have registered for the tests on Saturday and ...
